name: Beasts of Mehetia
description:
Well I  was too short on  time to put all the ingame help or story I wanted to so I will use the description for that purpose.

Goal

You're about to start a ritual to celebrate then end of your childhood. Tomorrow, you will be a grown up. All you have to do is to enter the Mehetia Volcano and come back with the jade locket. Oh and the Mehetia is infested with  dreadly beasts, they are scary but somehow familiar. You'll get used to them.

Gameplay
  • You have to find the 4x piece of the locket to complete the ritual
  • To hit beast you need courage. If you do not own courage you will suffer in battle
  • Most of the beasts can growl to blow away your confidence
  • You must hide to build your courage back. You can't rebuild it if there are beasts in your sight.
  • If the danger is overwhelming and you are scared, please close your eyes.
Control
  • You can move your character with the arrow keys
  • Press X to access your inventory or validate your choice
  • Press E to close or open your eyes
  • The controller is supported ( A > action Y > close your eyes )
Hints
  • There are books with ancient memories in the Mehetia caves. Take time to read them on your way to the locket. Each book will help you grow.
  • For each beast you can dominate, a kori will be awarded
  • The old Ahu-Lani will trade these koris for some valuable goods. You will find him deep in the cave.
